title: Glass eye
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all eyeballs, see [list of eyeballs](/List_of_eyeballs "List of eyeballs").*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A floating eyeball formed from living glass. Only the divine Jiyva could form such a curious servitor.***“El ojo que ves no es ojo porque tú lo veas, es ojo porque te ve.” -Antonio Machado, Campos de Castilla. 1912-1917. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

**Glass eyes** are harmless on their own, but their [gaze](/Vitrifying_Gaze "Vitrifying Gaze") unavoidably inflicts the [Fragile](/Fragile "Fragile") status for 4-8 turns. Fragile causes you to take 50% more damage, making glass eyes a dangerous support monster. They can be found in [the Slime Pits](/The_Slime_Pits "The Slime Pits") and [the Depths](/The_Depths "The Depths").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                       |                                                                                                            |
| :---------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Vitrifying Gaze](/Vitrifying_Gaze "Vitrifying Gaze") | [Magical flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags"), [Instant flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Watch out - the +50% damage really hurts if other monsters are around you.
- Their gaze doesn't need a line of fire to hurt you. Just being in [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight") of the glass eye will put you at risk.
- As monsters made out of glass, they are vulnerable to [Lee's Rapid Deconstruction](/Lee%27s_Rapid_Deconstruction "Lee's Rapid Deconstruction") and [Shatter](/Shatter "Shatter"). LRD in particular will cause a range-2 blast when targeting them.

## History

- Glass eyes were introduced in [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), replacing [floating eyes](/Floating_eye "Floating eye"), which could irresistibly [paralyze](/Paralyze "Paralyze") the player.
html:
Glass eye

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all eyeballs, see list of eyeballs.

glass eye G 
HP 32-66
HD 9
XP 261
Speed 10
AC 2
EV 12
Will 60



Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type floating eye, glass eye
Flags See invisible
Flying
No skeleton
A floating eyeball formed from living glass. Only the divine Jiyva could form such a curious servitor.

“El ojo que ves
no es ojo porque tú lo veas,
es ojo porque te ve.”
-Antonio Machado, Campos de Castilla. 1912-1917.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Glass eyes are harmless on their own, but their gaze unavoidably inflicts the Fragile status for 4-8 turns. Fragile causes you to take 50% more damage, making glass eyes a dangerous support monster. They can be found in the Slime Pits and the Depths.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Vitrifying Gaze Magical flag,
Instant flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Watch out - the +50% damage really hurts if other monsters are around you.
  • Their gaze doesn't need a line of fire to hurt you. Just being in line of sight of the glass eye will put you at risk.
  • As monsters made out of glass, they are vulnerable to Lee's Rapid Deconstruction and Shatter. LRD in particular will cause a range-2 blast when targeting them.

History

  • Glass eyes were introduced in 0.31, replacing floating eyes, which could irresistibly paralyze the player.
